source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH MeestRecenteFactuur AS (
        -- Selecteer alleen de meest recente factuur per timesheet split
        SELECT 
            ILI.[Krow__Timesheet_Split__c],
            INV.[Revenue_Category__c],
            ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ILI.[Krow__Timesheet_Split__c] 
                               ORDER BY INV.[Krow__Invoice_Date__c] DESC, ILI.[CreatedDate] DESC) AS FactuurRank
        FROM [s2_stg_salesforce].[InvoiceLineItem] ILI
        INNER JOIN [s2_stg_salesforce].[Invoice] INV
            ON ILI.[Krow__Invoice__c] = INV.[Id]
        WHERE ILI.[Krow__Timesheet_Split__c] IS NOT NULL
    ),
    GeschrevenUrenData AS (
        SELECT 
            ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 
                T.[Krow__Date__c], 
                T.[Krow__Project_Resource__c], 
                T.[Krow__Krow_Project__c], 
                T.[Krow__Krow_Task__c], 
                T.[Krow__Account__c] 
                ORDER BY T.[Krow__Date__c]) AS RowNum, -- Unique key per partition
            CAST(T.[Krow__Date__c] AS DATE) AS Datum,
            T.[Krow__Project_Resource__c],
            T.[Krow__Account__c],
            T.[Krow__Krow_Project__c],
            T.[Krow__Krow_Task__c],
            T.[Krow__Approval_Status__c] AS GoedkeuringsStatus,
            T.[Krow__Billable__c] AS IsFacturabel,
            T.[Krow__Invoiced__c] AS IsGefactureerd,
            T.[Krow__Hours__c] AS AantalUren,
            T.[Krow__Billable_Hours__c] AS FacturabeleUren,
            T.[Krow__Non_Billable_Hours__c] AS NietFacturabeleUren,
            T.[Krow__Bill_Amount__c] AS OmzetPotentie,
            T.[Krow__Time_Comments__c] AS Opmerkingen,
            T.[Krow__Time_Off_Type__c] AS Verloftype,
            T.[Krow__Bill_Rate__c] AS CommercieelTarief,
            T.[Krow__Cost_Rate_New__c] * T.[Krow__Hours__c] AS KostprijsTarief,
            T.[Id] AS TimesheetSplitId,
            P.[ProjectKey],
            M.[MedewerkerKey],
            PR.[PracticeKey],
            K.[KlantKey],
            R.[TaakregelKey],
            MRF.[Revenue_Category__c] AS OmzetCategorie
        FROM [s2_stg_salesforce].[TimesheetSplit] T
        LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimProjecten] P
            ON T.[Krow__Krow_Project__c] = P.[ProjectId]
        LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimMedewerkers] M
            ON T.[Krow__Project_Resource__c] = M.[MedewerkerIdSF]
        LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimPractice] PR
            ON M.[Practice] = PR.[PracticeNaam]
        LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimKlanten] K
            ON T.[Krow__Account__c] = K.[KlantID]
        LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimTaakregels] R
            ON T.[Krow__Krow_Task__c] = R.[TaakregelId]
        LEFT JOIN MeestRecenteFactuur MRF
            ON T.[Id] = MRF.[Krow__Timesheet_Split__c]
            AND MRF.[FactuurRank] = 1
    )
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Datum, MedewerkerKey, ProjectKey, TaakregelKey) AS GeschrevenUrenKey -- Global sequential unique key
        ,[Datum]
      ,[Krow__Project_Resource__c]
      ,[Krow__Account__c]
      ,[Krow__Krow_Project__c]
      ,[Krow__Krow_Task__c]
      ,[GoedkeuringsStatus]
      ,[IsFacturabel]
      ,[IsGefactureerd]
      ,[AantalUren]
      ,[FacturabeleUren]
      ,[NietFacturabeleUren]
      ,OmzetPotentie
      ,[Opmerkingen]
      ,[Verloftype]
      ,[CommercieelTarief]
      ,[KostprijsTarief]
      ,[ProjectKey]
      ,[MedewerkerKey]
      ,[KlantKey]
      ,[PracticeKey]
      ,[TaakregelKey]
      ,[OmzetCategorie]
    FROM GeschrevenUrenData
